title: Paramedic Speciality Lecturer
text:
Expires: 8th December 2015 
Established in 2006, the Fatima College of Health Sciences (FCHS), part of the Institute of Applied Technology, aims to meet the United Arab Emirates' growing need for skilled healthcare professionals. 
FCHS is accredited by the Ministry of Higher Education and Scientific Research nationally and is internationally benchmarked through Griffith and Monash Universities in Australia. The College will also offer Higher Diploma and Bachelor degrees in different Health Sciences Specialties including Pharmacy, Nursing, Physiotherapy, Medical Imaging and Paramedics. 
Are you a qualified paramedic educator, passionate about teaching your speciality discipline and interested in expanding your teaching portfolio? 
The Bachelor of Emergency Health Program at Fatima College of Health Sciences http://www.fchs.ac.ae/En/Programs/Pages/default.aspx in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates is currently inviting applications from faculty in prehospital, paramedic care and life support education. By offering professional entry and higher education programs in Paramedics, the College has a vision to be a major contributor to the pre-hospital workforce and health system development in the UAE. 
The Bachelor of Emergency Health is a new program offering the Monash Universityâ€™s BEH Curriculum. The College is now experiencing an exciting period of growth as it expands existing operations with more students interested in this dynamic Bachelor program. 
We require candidates who possess appropriate qualifications and/or experience to deliver subjects such as, anatomy and Physiology, Paramedic Law and Ethics, Advanced Paramedic Cardiac and Respiratory Management, Pre-Hospital Critical Care/ MICA/ Rapid Response experience and Life Support Education 
You may be required to Support and mentor students in practice (HAAD License is a requirement for this role). 
Interest is sought from experienced clinically current educators (minimum of Masters level). Paramedic educators who also possess experience and competencies in teaching by simulation will be highly regarded. 
A Higher Education Teaching and Learning qualification is desired but not essential. 
We offer a tax free salary package with excellent benefits that includes housing allowance, educational allowance for dependent children, annual travel allowance for the staff and dependents, and health insurance. 
CVs should be submitted to suzanne.gill@iat.ac.ae or apply online at www.iat.ac.ae Share this job
